title: How do I make bluetooth max volume louder on Pixel 3xl with Airpods pro?
content: I bought some Airpods pro for my Pixel 3 XL and the max volume is to quiet even in a silent room. I've tried going to developer options and I turned on "disable absolute volume", I've tried volume booster apps, and forgetting and reconnecting to my Airpods pro yet I haven't found anything that makes any difference.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
